:v: chrisflav can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10665765360/job/29559803750)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10665765360/job/29559802925)

```suggestion
/-- A morphism of schemes `f : X ⟶ Y` is locally of finite presentation if for each affine `U ⊆ Y`
and `V ⊆ f ⁻¹' U`, The induced map `Γ(Y, U) ⟶ Γ(X, V)` is of finite presentation. -/
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry): morphisms locally of finite presentation
